alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:20PM CDT until June 04 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... North central Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... South central Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bellevue, or 11 miles southwest of Nashville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brentwood, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Belle Meade, Kingston Springs, Pegram, Bellevue and Natchez Trace At Highway 96. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 185 and 201. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
